summary: This is an email correspondence regarding an update to the Epstein victim website, notifying about a court hearing ordered in the case of United States v. Jeffrey Epstein following his death. The hearing is scheduled for August 27, 2019, to address the proposed nolle prosequi order and will allow victims and their counsel to be heard.

keyFacts: A hearing was ordered on August 21, 2019, in the case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein following his death.
The hearing is in connection with a nolle prosequi order proposed by the United States Attorney on August 19, 2019.
The hearing is scheduled for August 27, 2019, before Judge Richard M. Berman, allowing victims and their counsel to be heard.
The document is an email update for an Epstein victim website, indicating ongoing communication with victims post-Epstein's death.
The case number is identified as 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), confirming it is a criminal case in the Southern District of New York.
